website_summaries.verdict: A well-made, fluffy duvet with genuine down that tops our list. Its competitors can't top its fill or thread count.
pros: Boasts authentic goose down with more than 750-fill power
Cover features genuine Egyptian cotton and 600-thread count for optimal softness
cons: It's heavy, but this is a minor concern considering the quality

customer_reviews.title: I love the warmth of this comforter I live in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the warmth of this comforter I live in the north east and its really holding its own right now. I had to mark it down a star though because it seems like there are fine feathers that are just pouring out of it. I have checked every inch of the comforter to see if there was a rip that needed patching but nothing and these feathers just seem to ooze out of it from everywhere. I wake up covered in these fine feathers and they are all over my room. That being said it is still a very warm comforter and I'm never cold when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT winter Comforter
customer_reviews.text: This is super comfy, Its like sleeping with a giant flowing pillow, some times I wake up and i'm resting my head on this instead of my pillows. It fits my King sized bed pretty well. The fabric feels nice and the fill is perfect for my preferences. I got this so I didn't have to turn on the heat in the winter (I live in Texas). So at night when it's between 55F and 35F outside, I don't have to turn on the heat and this comforter keeps me nice and warm. This would not be a good all year comforter in Texas.
customer_reviews.author: Fairy

customer_reviews.title: HUGE HEAVY AND COMFY!!
customer_reviews.text: I would have taken a picture for review but I put it right into a duvet cover and have been sleeping with it for a week now. It’s heavy but not too heavy and very warm when underneath it. I really love it and it’s exactly what I was looking for after researching tons of comforters. So glad I decided to go with this one. No feathers have come out either. I will update if anything changes but until then I’m very happy with my purchase. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Russo

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m squirming I’m by bed by how satisfying it is... I took hours looking up what a good duvet consisted of and the is the one I finally chose to buy. I didn’t want something too expensive.. I needed it to be fluffy! I looked up what makes a good duvet and it came down to 100% down 100% Egyptian Cotten and the fact that it is 70oz is what helped me find a fluffy one... I am I first time duvet buyer but had friends with with them and honestly I’d have to say mine feels the most luxurious
customer_reviews.author: nichole

customer_reviews.title: Punches above it’s weight class !
customer_reviews.text: I have just had this for a day and I noticed a couple things - 1) It’s put together nicely. Looks like high quality stuff. 2) Keeps you warm. Granted I have had only a nights sleep under this but it was very cold last night and this kept us warm. 3) I posted the picture since this thing really fluffed up in 15 hours. Out of the box it was flat which scared me a little. Hope this turns out well in the long run but satisfied so far with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SNRS

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is very puffy and warm. When I opened it I was so hopeful. The fabric is rough, paperlike despite several softening attempts ( in the dryer as water would damage the down). It's extremely loud and hot. Fill power isn't the amount of down put into the comforter, but the quality of the down. A 750 fill power comforter should be incredibly light but still warm, this seems very heavy, I believe its over 10 lbs. Comparatively other confirmed 700+ fill power down comforters with similar fill weight weigh around 70 oz or 4.5 lbs. That being said it is still a decent comforter for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy. Warm. Drying problems.
customer_reviews.text: **update** squares are not sewn completely closed. So when you wash and dry the feathers group to the edges. Not great for the warmth it had originally. Super thick and heavy. I live in a trailer in one of the coldest places in Colorado. I like to have the heat at 55F at night. I use this and a fleece blanket on colder nights. Awesome. Yes semi Crinkly but I don't have a problem with feathers escaping.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition and got delivered very fast
customer_reviews.text: Perfect condition and got delivered very fast. I was a lilittle nervous on buying a down comforter on amazon but I'm happy I did. I absolutely love this comforter... It does get a Lil warm at night but next time I'll get a lightweight one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the material of this comforter
customer_reviews.text: I love the material of this comforter. It's so soft and warm and just the right amount of weight. I have anxiety so I like to sleep with weight in my blankets and this is perfect. It can get a little warm in the heat (or if your significant other or pet doubles as a personal heater), but with the window cracked, I wake up feeling like I've just slept on a cloud. I definitely recommend this comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly O.

customer_reviews.title: Love this duvet
customer_reviews.text: Love this duvet!! It can get a little warm at times but it is super soft and cuddly. My husband is super picky when it comes to duvets, esp with our last one being super pricey and a DUD. But this was half the price, more luxurious and great for cold nights.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Davila

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: The best comforter for the price! Can’t believe how cheap this comforter is compared to Macy’s and other stores. Such good quality and so comfortable. Not too thick but also enough weight and feathers to keep me warm. Never got hot under this comforter. I bought a 700$ comforter from Macy’s and returned it because I liked this one better. One thing is that i did find one feather that pricked me but after 4 months, haven’t seen any other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for two weeks and it's just what we was looking for. We ended up lowering our thermostat to 64 degrees at night and could drop it more because it is so warm.You will not get cold with this one. Its soft, and comfortable. Heavier than most the comforters I have seen at the store, but definitely not too heavy. The down stays in the square boxes, so the warmth is even. Update: We have had this for over two years and still love it. It looks like the day we got it. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and certainly very warm
customer_reviews.text: This thing is actually too warm! We got the medium weight, live in maine and keep the house cold by all standards (below 60). My wife and I both kick the covers off most nites, should have gotten the lightweight. Great quality and certainly very warm. If your a cold sleeper and can't get warm - this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: gabby belanger

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I wanted 100% down. This is not. And it’s not soft. It’s hot and itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended - it works
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, it feels great, it is relatively lightweight, plenty warm and gives me all the comfort that I need while in bed. The quality of this Down Comforter is great for the money. In my opinion, similar 550-700 fp-rated down comforters offered at retail stores for 2-3 times more are no better. It is unlikely that the fill power of this comforter is truly a 750 but it would be unrealistic to expect that for the price it has been offered at. And no sticking feather so far... I have got a king size for a queen size bed and put it inside of one of these queen-oversized duvet covers -which made a perfect match overall.
customer_reviews.author: SergeyT

customer_reviews.title: a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace our old down comforter. My wife loves it. It covers our king size bed well and is very full. I noticed no bad smell or crinkly sound when you shake it out. Feathers stay in the cover and the quilted sections prevent drift. I found cheaper options out there but for a huge drop in quality and fill power. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Very very warm. MN winter time use only!
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely a winter only down comforter. Very heavy. But high quality! On the search for something more light weight but fluffy looking. It does have fluff! But super hot imo. Have lost some feathers. If you have allergies, don’t buy it. I can already tell I will need to double up on the duvet somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Demolition Assemble

customer_reviews.title: Good duvet for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great comforter for the price. Yes, the material is a little noisy like others have commented, but it really does reduce with time and wear. We’re about a month into use right now and it’s very comfortable, not too hot (we live in NC, USA), and not too noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Estes

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it. First time purchasing an item like this on line I was a bit hesitant however I trust Amazon. Not disappointed at all Extremely satisfied Thank you
customer_reviews.author: bertha wainer

customer_reviews.title: Light and warm duvet, responsive seller
customer_reviews.text: Original review (2 stars) This comforter makes a ruffling noise when moved. The shell should be made of softer material to reduce noise, it almost sounds like paper! [EDIT] The seller has contacted promptly and worked with us to resolved the issue by shipping a replacement cover. The new cover was from the same brand but different texture to the material and slightly different design. Feels and 'sounds' better. Our complaint is resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Mezhibouski

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had to take the time to review...it's actually like the photo. Stitched perfectly in boxes so no feathers shift, I do not know what others mean by having to dust floor, I've had it days now with no cover and haven't seen a single feather. I bought King for a queen bed and I would say it's a great fit but I'm not sure how it would be on a king maybe a little shorter than I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hullihen

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUSLY COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: After we got into bed with our new comforter, we looked at each other and said "uh oh!"...We never want to get out of bed now! You guys, this is the most comfortable thing ever and I cannot believe the price tag that goes with it. I am a super hot sleeper, but also like feeling cozied up. It so fluffy and warm, but not in an overheating way. Great purchase for any type of sleeper and worth more than it costs!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Weighs a ton, needs more fluff
customer_reviews.text: No thank you. From the smell to the texture and the sound it makes! I had to send this back as it was heavy and uncomfortable and questionably Egyptian cotton. I also didn't like the rough stitching but the deal breaker was really the way it felt -- Heavy, not comfortable at all. I found a nice fluffy goose down comforter at bed bath and beyond for even cheaper than what this one is being sold for! I would recommend to look into that one instead, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Great down
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice comforter. It is medium weight so perfect for us - I would consider this a year round comforter. I don't like a duvet, ordered the white, and it looks good on the bed as is. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice..
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect for California weather as it is not too heavy or warm. We are very happy with the weight of this comforter and would recommend to others looking for a comforter that is not too heavy but will keep you warm in the winter
customer_reviews.author: Captain

customer_reviews.title: So cozy
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is so soft and cozy. It can tend to get a little warm during the summer time but it’s so soft that I couldn’t bring my self to remove it. If you get hot then just pop one leg out and you’re good to go. This comforter makes me love bedtime. It doesn’t have a harsh smell upon arrival either.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: not as heavy as I would have liked
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a heavier comforter and after reading the reviews, I thought this might be the one. It is very comfortable and warm, however it is extremely lightweight - no heavier than a polyester filled down-alternative.
customer_reviews.author: a hudson

customer_reviews.title: Affordable quality down conforter
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a vacuum sealed package and seems almost too small to be warm, but alas it’s a pretty great down blanket. a looks nice and fills up well after a few hours of airing out. awe really like this comforter. great quality for price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W

customer_reviews.title: super fluffy!
customer_reviews.text: really love its weight and fluffiness. Works great for the winter. This can be too warm for the summer season.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!!! Very heavy and fluffy absolutely love it. I did a lot of research before choosing this down comforter and this one was definitely the best one for the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and its perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love my Goose Down Comforter. It's exactly has described on the Amazon store, sold by Egyptian Cotton Bedding Warehouse. It's feels so fluffy and soft and cozy. It's made so beautiful. So elegant. Am Extremely happy with my purchase and would highly recommend. Also, very fast shipping. Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Perez

customer_reviews.title: ... the first time two nights ago and it's so beautiful and warm
customer_reviews.text: Took this comforter out for the first time two nights ago and it's so beautiful and warm. It's been in the 30s this week and I usually keep my house around 60 overnight bc I hate being hot. I'm nice and warm, but not hot under this comforter and it looks so stylish. Immediately made my bedroom look like a million bucks. I don't know if it will stand the test of time, but I'm happy so far
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Know your fill weight requirements
customer_reviews.text: We love everything about this but we didn’t realize the fill weight would insure your bed was like a heater. This fill weight would be great for really cold climates or for someone who truly wants to have a completely heated spot in bed. I love the material, the down in this but I’m going to have to hang this one up and get less than 750 fill because we sweat now when we sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Dalcraw

customer_reviews.title: Great quality !!! A must try
customer_reviews.text: Awesome down comforter! Way too hot for summer though!! My old worn out one must have been really worn out because I used it year round .... I might have to get a summer weight one too. The quality compares to LL bean !
customer_reviews.author: Fluffy Paws

customer_reviews.title: Puffy & Warm
customer_reviews.text: The puffiest comforter ever! I love to sleep in a cool bedroom under a warm comforter. This one is perfect for me! I have to admit that it's a little too heavy but I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sebnem

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: we were hesitant on buying a new Down comforter but this one is Amazing, we've had it for a few months now and are so happy with it. we haven't even bought a cover for it yet. if you are not sure if you should spend the money and buy it. DO IT..its worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fluffy. A little bit too hot for ...
customer_reviews.text: Soft and fluffy. A little bit too hot for now in north america. There's a smell all over the comforter at first. So I put it somewhere to make the wind blow away the smell and it does.
customer_reviews.author: Yu-Ting Huang

customer_reviews.title: Responsible seller
customer_reviews.text: Great service. I received a defective item and the seller immediately contacted me about it. I received a refund and I had the option to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Stardust

customer_reviews.title: Fluff!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fluff! I threw it in the dryer to fluff it up and it definitely worked. I read review after review, looking for “hotel quality”. This is a great comforter!!
customer_reviews.author: ussery home

customer_reviews.title: I liked it for about 2 weeks -- very soft
customer_reviews.text: I liked it for about 2 weeks -- very soft, fluffy, and seemingly of good quality (although as others have noted, you CAN see dark duck feathers through the cover -- it is not pure down). After about 2 weeks, it began to develop the tell-tale "duck farm" smell that so many cheap down products develop. I tried washing it, to no avail; my room smells like duck whenever this is in there. Luckily, Amazon accepted a return due to poor quality and I'm receiving a refund. Will not purchase another cheap down comforter from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy Sounding
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews claiming the comforter was super soft and made no noise, turns out it is the the most crinkley noisy down comforter I have purchased .yuk!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Great Comforter
customer_reviews.text: Great comforter. I love it have no issues with it yet. I hope I never do. Keeps me cool during the summer with the central air on and I haven’t experienced a winter yet but I’m sure it’ll keep me warm. Very soft but also heavy feel to it so I enjoy it a lot
customer_reviews.author: J P

customer_reviews.title: Love this Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about our down comforter we purchased last year. It's light weight and very cozy. I hate to have anything heavy on me while I'm trying to sleep and this comforter is warm and light weight. Love It!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier with this comforter
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this comforter! Very warm and cozy. Fluffed it in the dryer on air fluff for about 30 minutes before covering it with a duvet and using it on our bed.
customer_reviews.author: miagd

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and warm- looks more expensive than it is!
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for a quality down comforter for a while but didn't want to spent over $200. This one came recommended from a website on down comforters with a warning that it is heavy and hot; it is both and it's perfect. The stitching around the edges makes it look luxurious and the thread count is thick and of good quality. I love the weight of it. If you're looking for a heavy and WARM comforter in the under $200 range this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bill hart

customer_reviews.title: Not as heavy as is stated
customer_reviews.text: We have now had this down comforter for over a month and it does not live up to it's description. I bought for the sole reason that it was the heaviest queen duvet we could find on Amazon and sadly it was much lighter in weight than we expected. Was hoping for something over 10lbs and this only weighs roughy 8 lbs after numerous attempts to fluff it out and wear it in.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Dee

customer_reviews.title: Too Noisy - Great Loft
customer_reviews.text: The fill count and loft is excellent, but I returned due to the noise of the fabric. Without being quite as extreme, it crinkles like a bag of chips even with a cover on. Otherwise nice, but with that issue it wasn’t worth the price. Sleeps warm but that is expected with the full count.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: I hate buying any bedding without putting my hands on it ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate buying any bedding without putting my hands on it first. However, I'm not disappointed, and absolutely love this comforter. Not to warm and not too hot. We use it all year and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Feathers don't fly out of it (feels like ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Feathers don't fly out of it (feels like there's a layer to contain the feathers, then the cotton), there are ties on each corner, I love the weight.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: High quality for low cost
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. Love the weight and quality
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: amazing comforter!
customer_reviews.text: we love this conformer! so soft and warm! Product was accuracy described in listing, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fink

customer_reviews.title: High quality goose down comforter!
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter, I purchased another one for my daughter cause she loved it. In the last ten years I have gone through 5 different ones. This one beats them all. It feels like a $500+ one. It’s very fluffy and very soft. I would highly recommend this goose down.
customer_reviews.author: Kyrene Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Comforter
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. A little warmer than an all year around comforter for Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Chartier

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, but Too Hot
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice and luxurious and well made and all of that, but it was just way way too warm. We used it through the NYC winter, from November until now in March, and after many nights tossing and turning or waking up sweaty, its just too hot for us. We're going to try again with a down alternative at 7.3 pounds, where this one is 10.55 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Patellos

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, a bit warm for me
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. However, I feel it may be too warm for me. I'm a hott sleeper in search of a cozy/fluffy/cloudlike yet cool down comforter. Considering returning for the 50oz. Torn on the thread count also, not sure which would provide a cooler sleeping experience- 600 or 1200TC?
customer_reviews.author: AMP

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to upgrade to a king duvet for my queen bed because I wanted it to feel lush and comfortable with plenty hanging down the sides. It's perfect. Not too hot but feels lovely. Definitely feels more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid comforter
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid comforter. Large king size does not seem to shift much inside the duvet. It is a little noisy, but I think that might have gotten quieter the longer I've had it.
customer_reviews.author: Fun E. Guy

customer_reviews.title: It sounds like you are opening a bag of sun chips every ...
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is so loud- Will Be returning. It sounds like you are opening a bag of sun chips every time you even wiggle your toes...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter!
customer_reviews.text: Received this comforter and it was exactly what I wanted. Good weight, nice and fluffy right out of the package. Have yet to see a stray feather. The down does shift a bit, but I think that's to be expected in any down comforter. The baffles aren't sewn all the way through, but neither was the previous comforter I had that was twice as expensive. All you have to do is give it a good shake and it all settles out. Definitely a warm comforter. Not sure we'll be able to use in summer.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Whipple

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this duvet! It fluffed right up after being in the dryer....I put it in the cover I bought and slept great all night....my husband loved it as well....money well spent
customer_reviews.author: Candice Hanchey

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Heavy
customer_reviews.text: It's super heavy, which is what I wanted. It hangs down nicely on both sides of my queen sized matteress.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. Avoid
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is trash. Leaks a TON of down everywhere even when not in use. It's not even ripped, it just leaks it through the fabric. Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisWoWGamer

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter!
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price. Stayed warm all winter. Feather loss wasn't hugely significant as compared to other more expensive down comforters.
customer_reviews.author: AvidAmazon'r

customer_reviews.title: I am super impressed with this
customer_reviews.text: I am super impressed with this! It is so warm and it isn't super puffy. We got a king size for our queen size bed--it hangs over about 18 inches all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Heil

customer_reviews.title: It is of great quality but will keep you maybe too toasty
customer_reviews.text: You will sweat under this blanket. It is of great quality but will keep you maybe too toasty. For the cold season this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I wanted a down comforter that was full and heavy duty. This is the best down comforter I have ever owned-very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Love this comforter! As others have mentioned, it does sometimes make a crinkly sound but found this to be fine. A great value and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great cold winter down comforter
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for cold Boston winters. Very heavy. Very warm. Great cold winter down comforter
customer_reviews.author: Cwaylyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and comfortable weight. Not too hot and not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Whitesell

customer_reviews.title: I have had several down comforters and nothing like this. The material is awful
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. I have had several down comforters and nothing like this. The material is awful. It will make a crackling similar to crumpling paper.
customer_reviews.author: MLH

customer_reviews.title: Very fluffy Duvet feels like really good quality didn’t shed at all
customer_reviews.text: Very fluffy Duvet feels like really good quality didn’t shed at all . Comes in a nice bag and keeps you warm but not too warm . Living in SoCal
customer_reviews.author: TCAS

customer_reviews.title: This compares to my Ralph Lauren comforter which I've enjoyed 15 years
customer_reviews.text: This compares to my Ralph Lauren comforter which I've enjoyed 15 years. I got the 75 fill power version and it seems warm and a good weight. No noticeable feather shedding. Happy with purchase. And, it's half the cost of the RL version.
customer_reviews.author: virginia gardner

customer_reviews.title: I looked like I had walked off that scene in Home Alone ...
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is very "fluffy" and warm but when I was reading other reviews they were saying that they did not notice it losing feathers. I took it out of my duvet cover today to wash the duvet and there were in fact lots of little feathers. I looked like I had walked off that scene in Home Alone when I was finished... granted I was wearing a black shirt so maybe it was just more noticeable. I'm hoping it will hold up, I have only had it a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: heather chapman

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for fluffy and soft!! Perfect purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Most amazing comforter. So soft and fluffy. Definitely worth the price. Only problem was I wish it was wider. I bought a king size to fit my bed and it seems a little short on both sides. Other than that it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: christina ivanyuk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite comforters! It is thick and keeps me warm. Not too heavy. Really snuggly!
customer_reviews.author: May Truong

customer_reviews.title: This  exceeded my expectations and I ordered king size to drape my queen size bed
customer_reviews.text: I finally replaced my old queen sized down comforter after owning it for over 14 years. I wanted one just as nice as I am super picky about the cotton cover and loft and fluffiness. I decided to get a King size so it would drape nearly to the floor on each side as I don't use a bed skirt. This one is perfect and fits wonderfully as well as being heavy and warm and I can't wait for chilly winter nights to enjoy it even more. The price was well worth it and the construction is just as good as comforters costing hundreds more.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Trolinger

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious Down Comforter
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased!! I was a bit apprehensive buying a down comforter on-line vs in store..I spent some time reading reviews on Amazon of various brands of down comforters before making the plunge and buying.. I was looking for a comforter that was fluffy/full..I am very satisfied with this comforter..yes it does come compactly packaged, but does fluff once unpacked and shaken up a bit..it is perfectly full and fluffy, looks great with my new PB duvet..and offers more than enough of warmth for the area in which we reside..(Kansas)..my husband says a bit too much..I would reccomend this down comfortor. I am going to purchase this product for the other beds in the house!

product_meta.title: Egyptian Bedding 600-Thread-Count Egyptian Cotton Siberian Goose Down Comforter, 750 Fill Power, Solid White (King Size)
product_meta.description: Size:King SizeWrap yourself in Egyptian Bedding 600 Thread Count 100% Egyptian Cotton Siberian GOOSE DOWN Comforter that is truly worthy of a classy elegant suite and is found in world class hotels. Constructed with premium Box construction design that helps fill retain volume and full loft in each chamber for even thickness. Woven to a luxurious 600 threads per square inch, this fine Luxury Bed Comforter is crafted from Long Staple 100% Egyptian Cotton. Comfort, quality and opulence sets this Luxury Bedding in a class above the rest. NOTE : Down products are packaged tightly during shipping. Upon receipt, please remove the product from the packaging, fluff gently, and allow several hours to recover the full loft. In addition, being sealed in a plastic packaging sometimes causes the scent of these natural products to concentrate. A few hours of airing usually removes the odor. Warranty Only When Purchased from an Authorized Egyptian Bedding Reseller.
feature_bullets: This is a All-Season Down Comforter. Luxurious Siberian GOOSE DOWN Comforter Provides Medium Warmth For Year Round Comfort
Filling with 750+ Fill power, 70 oz Fill Weight, 100% White Goose Down
Goose Down Comforter is 106 x 90 inches in size. Loops & Tabs are designed to anchor duvet cover and protect comforter from shifting
Ultra-plush Baffle Box design keeps the down evenly distributed and ensures maximum loft & comfort. Double needle stitch prevent down leakage.

Brand New & Factory Sealed in a Beautiful Zippered Gift Packaging. Down products are packaged tightly during shipping. Upon receipt, please remove the product from the packaging, fluff gently, and allow several hours to recover the full loft. In addition, being sealed in a plastic packaging sometimes causes the scent of these natural products to concentrate. A few hours of airing usually removes the odor.
